Articles.Content:
How long have you had the full version of ksp for.

Me, ah... I did have it until my computer crashed, and I'm having troubles downloading it again because my internets is stuffing up.

1 year, since the full version/payable was released.

3 years+ makes no sense, as KSP didn't exist back then.

-snip-

3 years+ makes no sense, as KSP didn't exist back then.

Uh...... I didn't know that. Just pretend it isn't there, you didn't see anything.
Can you not have it for 2 years?
I've had it for 2 years. Why no option?
I never knew that KSP only came out a few years ago, I'm new to making polls, and I don't know how to change the poll (If you can) once it has started.

I've known about KSP - or at least seen videos of it - probably since its first release. I had 0.13 for quite some time before finally managing to pony up the cash for v0.18.x.

Managed to sneak in just a month or so before the "future content for free" April deadline, too. Ain't regretted the purchase one bit.
Unofficially, I've had it for about a year. Yes - I did pirate the game at first, but it was so damn good I just had to buy it as soon as it hit Steam. Probably the best 20Ã¢â€šÂ¬ I've ever spent.
